request.description: Add a product to user's features. Replace '1' with the product ID.
Remove a product from user's features. Replace '1' with the product ID.
Check if a product is in user's features. Replace '1' with the product ID.

body.raw:
{
  "medicine_name": "Paracetamol",
  "image_id": 1,
  "image_ids": [2, 3, 4],
  "category_id": 1,
  "ingredients": "Paracetamol",
  "discount_type": "percentage",
  "discount_value": 10,
  "how_to_use": "Take 1-2 tablets every 4-6 hours",
  "description": "Fast-acting pain relief",
  "is_visible": true,
  "is_temporarily_hidden": false,
  "dosages": [
    { "name": "250mg", "price": 80, "stock_quantity": 100 },
    { "name": "500mg", "price": 150, "stock_quantity": 50 }
  ]
}
